articles.author: CARA ANNA
articles.title: African leaders leave Russia summit without grain deal or a path to end the war in Ukraine - The Associated Press
articles.description: African leaders are leaving two days of meetings with Russian President Vladimir Putin with little to show in response to their requests to resume a deal that kept grain flowing from Ukraine and to find a way to end the war there. During a press conference Sa…
articles.content: NAIROBI, Kenya (AP) African leaders are leaving two days of meetings with Russian President Vladimir Putin with little to show for their requests to resume a deal that kept grain flowing from Ukraine… [+2576 chars]

articles.author: Pierre Meilhan, Martin Goillandeau, Joshua Berlinger
articles.title: France and EU cut off financial support to Niger following military coup - CNN
articles.description: France and the EU have cut off financial support to Niger after a coup toppled the West African country’s democratically elected president.
articles.content:
France and the EU have cut off financial support to Niger after a coup toppled the West African countrys democratically elected president.
